\documentclass[10pt]{article}
\usepackage[margin=0.75in]{geometry}
\usepackage{fontspec}
\usepackage{enumitem}
\usepackage{titlesec}
\usepackage{hyperref}
\usepackage{xcolor}
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\usepackage{parskip}
\usepackage{sectsty}

% Set main font
\setmainfont{DejaVu Sans}

% Section styling
\sectionfont{\Large\bfseries\sffamily}
\titleformat{\subsection}[runin]{\bfseries}{}{0em}{}[ -- ]

% Remove spacing between list items
\setlist[itemize]{noitemsep, topsep=0pt, leftmargin=1.2em}
\setlist[enumerate]{noitemsep, topsep=0pt, leftmargin=1.2em}

% Hyperlink styling
\hypersetup{
  colorlinks=true,
  urlcolor=blue,
  linkcolor=black
}

% Header and footer
\pagestyle{fancy}
\fancyhf{}
\fancyhead[L]{Luke Richardson Resume}
\fancyfoot[C]{\thepage}

\end{document}
